snippet.title: Crystal Story: Awakening - Preview Version TEASER
snippet.description:
The Crystal Story: Awakening - Preview Version is available now!
https://bredfrown.itch.io/crystal-story

Crystal Story: Awakening is a project that I've been working on transparently for a little over a year now. It's still in polished "prototype" phase, which I'm referring to as a "Preview Version", but I've poured a lot of time and love into it, and am super proud of how it's shaping up. 

The Preview Version (demo) for Crystal Story: Awakening will be released on 12/31!
If you're interested, give it a try! I will be updating the description when the demo drops! For now, you can catch up with the game on these accounts:

OFFICIAL TWITTER ACCOUNT: https://twitter.com/thecrystalstory|
INSTAGRAM ACCOUNT: https://www.instagram.com/fredbreezyfosheezy/
